name: My Normal Life
description:
My Normal Life is a Comedy-Horror game created using Wolf RPG Editor.

Plot: Live out the normal life of a guy trapped in his own apartment room while being stalked by a monster for a week, and the only one capable of helping him is said monster's subordinate who's currently hiding in his bathroom plotting revenge against his own boss.

FEATURING:

- 4 different endings (Best, Good, Normal, & Bad).

- 1+ hour of total gameplay.

-  A rich storyline / story focused game.

- A Shadow best friend! (if you choose so).

All blended together with elements of Comedy and Horror!

     

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Warning: This game contains mild and censored swearings, jumpscares, eerie scenario, and other horror elements.

Disclaimer: This project was created using Wolf RPG Editor. All the music and sound used in this project were made available via downloading Wolf RPG Editor.
